page.title: 17FOOD & MEALS IN WALES.
page.content: {BREAKFAST-}A typical breakfast is cereal with cold milk, or porridge in Winter.Toast with jam,marmalade,peanut butter,marmite or dripping is popular as well as, or instead of cereal. Tea, coffee or fruit juice is drunk. {LUNCH-}varies according to a person's situation. Usually a light meal is eaten such as sandwiches or a hot snack. {TEA-}Most people eat their big meal of the day in the evening. Usually a cooked meal eg. lamb chops,potatoes, & some vegetable, apple pie and custard. {SUNDAYS- }This is the day of big meals! A cooked breakfast of bacon & eggs is popular.Our Sunday lunch is a joint of meat,two or three vegetables, potatoes,Yorkshire pudding and gravy, followed by a hot or cold pudding like treacle sponge and custard or rice pudding.Tea is usually light eg.salad.
